subject: Discrimination
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Dallas Mavericks’ owner, Mark Cuban, apologized to Trayvon Martin’s family over his choice of words in a videotaped interview in which he addressed bigotry and prejudice.
snippet: The Dallas Mavericks’ owner, Mark Cuban, apologized to Trayvon Martin’s family over his choice of words in a videotaped interview in which he addressed bigotry and prejudice.
